hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select t.uuid as uuid, t.create_time as create_time, t.creator as creator, t.modifier as modifier, t.modify_time as modify_time, t.rec_ver as rec_ver, t.test_stu_name as test_stu_name, t.t_stu_teacher as t_stu_teacher, t.t_stu_address as t_stu_address, t.t_stu_tel as t_stu_tel, t.t_stu_remark as t_stu_remark, t.photo_file as photo_file, t.t_std_sex as t_std_sex
from UF_TEST_STUDENT_TABLE t
where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(keyword)> and (t.name like '%' || :keyword || '%' ) </if> <if isNotBlank(whereSql)> and ${whereSql} </if> <if isNotBlank(orderBy)> ${orderBy} </if>
